name: British Airways Club Europe, A320 : Turin - London Gatwick
description:
Follow me on Snapchat: pauls_trips ¦ https://snapchat.com/add/pauls_trips

Follow me on Twitter: @pauls_trips ¦ https://twitter.com/pauls_trips

Follow me on Instagram: paulstripreports ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paulstripreports/

Date of Travel: 6 FEB 2017
Aircraft: Airbus A319-100
Tail: G-GATP
Livery: BA standard
Route: TRN-LGW
Weather on Departure: Broken cloud, winds gusting 30kts
Weather on Arrival: Broken cloud, winds 10kts
Airborne Time: 1h40m
Miles: 547
Remarks: None


Thanks for finding my video and pressing play! 

This video showcases British Airways Club Europe service on a brunch rotation. There's really not much special about this video - except the stunning views from the airport and on takeoff! 

A run-of-the-mill flight with BA. The next video coming up on my channel will feature the outbound flight from Luton with EasyJet! (A new airline for my channel...)

Enjoy the video, and thanks for watching. If you subscribe, then thanks for being part of the channel! Don't forget you can follow my travels in realtime on Snapchat!
